content: p o m e pome is full of cables hat worked in the round from the bottom up you may knit it as a beanie or as a slouchy hat add a pom pom even though pattern contains directions for m size only you can adjust the size of the finished hat using smaller/larger needles and finer/thicker yarn all rights reserved images text and charts are for personal non-commercial use only size head circumference recommended needle sizes m fits 20 5-22 52-56 cm around us #4/ 3 5mm circular needles or dpns us #6/ 4 0mm circular needles or dpns yarn 1 skein of merino gold madame tricote notions 60% wool 40% acrylic 200 m/218y in cable needle 100g or approx 200m/218 yards of any tapestry needle worsted yarn 1 stitch marker optional pom-pom tool gauge 20 sts = 10cm/4inches in stockinette skills stitches on the larger needles worked knit & purl sts flat knitting cables knitting in the round pome © agata smektała 2015 1 abbreviations c2b - put 1 st on to cn and hold it in back k1 k1 from cn c2f - put 1 st on to cn and hold it in front k1 k1 from cn c6b - put 3 sts on to cn and hold them in back k3 k3 from cn c6bp - put 3 sts on to cn and hold them in back k3 p1 k2 from cn c6f -
